thread.title: 10 shows to catch at the Ceramics Triennale 2015 in Canberra
thread.title_full: 10 shows to catch at the Ceramics Triennale 2015 in Canberra

title: 10 shows to catch at the Ceramics Triennale 2015 in Canberra
text:
10 shows to catch at the Ceramics Tri... 10 shows to catch at the Ceramics Triennale 2015 in Canberra Next Story Prev Story 2 hrs ago Read more: The Age 
You might not know it, but Canberra is playing host to the Australian Ceramics Triennale - it's a gathering of the nation's finest ceramicists, potters and clay artists. The triennale conference only runs from July 9-11 but Canberrans will get plenty of chances to see ceramic artwork on display.   The Age.
